projects.project_title: Social Media Trends Discovering Stories Behind the Data
projects.brief_description: Analyse social media data, tell visual stories, and capture insights.
projects.detailed_description: Analyze and visualize social media engagement data to uncover trending topics, audience preferences, and sentiment insights. Present findings using dashboards and storytelling techniques that make data engaging and easy to interpret.
projects.core_features: Collect and organize social media data,Create interactive Excel dashboards,Use PivotCharts for trend visualization,Apply storytelling principles to data insights

projects.project_title: Managing and Analyzing Patient Data with SQL
projects.brief_description: Design, manage, and analyze patient data.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a relational database for hospital operations to manage patient records, appointments, staff details, and treatments. Use SQL queries and stored procedures to efficiently retrieve and analyze medical data.
projects.core_features: Design ER diagrams for hospital workflows,Create and normalize relational tables,Develop SQL queries and stored procedures,Generate analytical reports on patient and staff data

projects.project_title: Building a Finance Tracker Console App in Python
projects.brief_description: Build a smart finance tracker on daily expenses.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a Python-based financial tracker that helps users record, categorize, and analyze expenses. Implement data structures and file handling to store and process financial data efficiently.
projects.core_features: Add, update, and delete expense records,Categorize expenses automatically,Generate monthly and category-wise reports,Store data persistently using file handling

projects.project_title: E-commerce Shopper Behavior Analysis using Python
projects.brief_description: Explore shopper patterns to uncover insights that drive sales.
projects.detailed_description: Analyze e-commerce transaction data to identify patterns in user behavior, popular product categories, and conversion trends. Use Python and visualization tools to derive insights that support marketing strategies.
projects.core_features: Clean and preprocess e-commerce datasets,Perform exploratory data analysis with Pandas,Visualize buying behavior using Seaborn,Identify customer segments and sales drivers

projects.project_title: Sales and Revenue Insights for Business Stakeholders
projects.brief_description: Turn business data into powerful, insight-rich dashboards.
projects.detailed_description: Build interactive Power BI dashboards that visualize key sales and revenue metrics. Use Power Query and DAX to clean, transform, and model data for actionable business intelligence.
projects.core_features: Integrate data from multiple business sources,Model relationships between datasets,Create KPIs and measures using DAX,Design interactive, visually appealing dashboards

projects.project_title: Banking Customer Churn Analytics for Marketing Teams
projects.brief_description: Identify customers at risk of leaving and boost retention.
projects.detailed_description: Analyze customer behavior data to predict churn using statistical and machine learning techniques. Apply hypothesis testing and inferential statistics to validate patterns and suggest retention strategies.
projects.core_features: Preprocess customer and transaction data,Perform statistical tests and correlation analysis,Build and evaluate churn prediction models,Recommend strategies to improve retention

projects.project_title: Delivery Performance Analysis for Logistics Managers
projects.brief_description: Predict product demand to optimize stock and boost business efficiency.
projects.detailed_description: Develop a complete analytics solution that combines data collection, cleaning, analysis, and machine learning to forecast product demand. Use Python, SQL, Power BI, and Excel for an integrated approach to business intelligence and predictive modeling.
projects.core_features: Collect and integrate data from multiple business sources,Clean and preprocess sales and inventory data,Build machine learning models to forecast demand,Visualize predictions with Power BI dashboards,Use GenAI tools for report generation and insights

projects.project_title: Secure a Linux System Like a Pro
projects.brief_description: Automate essential system tasks and secure a Linux environment.
projects.detailed_description: This project focuses on building a secure and well-organized Linux environment for an organization. It aims to automate system operations and implement structured access controls for improved efficiency and protection.
projects.core_features: Automate Linux system tasks through command scripting, Manage user access with clear permission controls, Set up and maintain system configurations efficiently, and Streamline server processes with virtualization tools.

projects.project_title: Manage Car Sales Data with Smart Databases
projects.brief_description: Organize, manage, and analyze car sales using databases.
projects.detailed_description: This project is designed to digitize and streamline sales operations in an automotive business. It focuses on creating structured data systems and interactive tools to manage customer and sales records efficiently.
projects.core_features: Design structured databases for sales operations, Track and manage customer and order records, Automate updates and data backups, and Build user-friendly menus for record management.

projects.project_title: Design a University Network from Scratch
projects.brief_description: Build and secure a functional network for multiple departments.
projects.detailed_description: This project aims to simulate the setup of a campus network with department-specific segregation. It enables proper network access, protection of critical servers, and continuous traffic monitoring.
projects.core_features: Build network architecture for departmental communication, Isolate sensitive resources for security compliance, Configure access rules to control inter-department connectivity, and Monitor traffic using packet inspection tools.

projects.project_title: Automate IT Monitoring and Build Smart Networks
projects.brief_description: Automate system diagnostics and set up smart, secure networks.
projects.detailed_description: This project enables efficient monitoring of systems and the design of a connected, secure infrastructure for an expanding organization. It emphasizes automation and preventive security practices.
projects.core_features: Automate diagnostic reports with interactive scripts, Set up IP-based connectivity across departments, Secure internal services with firewalls, and Enable daily system monitoring via log reports

projects.project_title: Build Scalable and Resilient Cloud Systems
projects.brief_description: An online service designed for safety, scalability, organization, and reliable data protection.
projects.detailed_description: This project will build a safe and flexible online service using trusted tools. It will protect data, handle traffic well, and stay reliable even if something goes wrong. The system will have three parts—what users see, how it works, and where data is stored—making it easy to run, grow, and keep secure.
projects.core_features: Implement a secure network that protects against threats, Design a system that scales easily for increased computing and storage needs, Deploy applications using a flexible containerized setup, Automate backup and data protection for reliable data management, and Ensure strong cloud security to minimize potential risks.

projects.project_title: Shield Digital Systems from Cyber Rogues
projects.brief_description: A project to improve system security by managing risks, access, protection, activity, and data.
projects.detailed_description: This project helps make an organization’s digital systems safer. It checks for weak spots, tracks logins, and alerts the team about anything unusual. It sets clear rules about who can access what and protects websites from common online threats. It also keeps sensitive information safe when it’s shared or stored, using trusted standards.
projects.core_features: Perform regular risk checks to identify and mitigate potential threats, Track logins for monitoring and security purposes, Limit access to sensitive areas to authorized users only, Protect the website from security breaches and attacks, and Ensure the safety of information through robust security measures.

projects.project_title: Hack Yourself First: Simulate Attacks to Stay Secure
projects.brief_description: A study of real-life digital threats, identifying system weaknesses, and ways to protect against risks.
projects.detailed_description: This project studied how digital systems can be attacked by safely simulating real cyber threats. It focused on spotting unusual behaviour, finding common system weaknesses, and understanding how attackers break into networks and websites. It also looked at flaws in popular software. Through hands-on work, the project helped show how attacks happen and how to defend against them.
projects.core_features: Detect attacks in real-time to respond swiftly and effectively, Conduct OS vulnerability testing to identify and address security weaknesses, Simulate active directory exploitation to assess potential security risks, Perform web application penetration testing to uncover vulnerabilities, and Analyze application-level vulnerabilities to enhance security measures.

projects.project_title: Spot the Cracks: Explore Network Security Gaps
projects.brief_description: Simulating attacks to explore system access and weaknesses in wired and wireless networks.
projects.detailed_description: This project studied how attackers break into and misuse network systems. It looked at how they move through systems, gain control, and exploit setup or communication flaws. It also explored weaknesses in wireless networks and devices like routers. The goal was to understand these attacks to help improve network security.
projects.core_features: Test pivoting and privilege escalation techniques to identify potential attack paths, Exploit network vulnerabilities to evaluate security weaknesses, Exploit wireless network vulnerabilities to ensure robust security, Analyze network hardware vulnerabilities to prevent unauthorized access, and Simulate real-world attacks to assess and strengthen overall network security.

projects.project_title: Fight Back Smart: Incident Response in Action
projects.brief_description: Preparing for security issues, analyzing malware, reviewing evidence, and adding protections.
projects.detailed_description: This project created a strong security plan to handle cyber threats and improve protection. It involved testing plans to quickly address issues, reduce damage, and recover data. The project also studied harmful software, gathered and analyzed digital evidence for investigations, and added protective measures to strengthen defences against threats.
projects.core_features: Develop and execute effective incident response plans to address security events, Analyze and mitigate malware to reduce its impact on systems, Conduct digital forensics and investigations to uncover and understand security breaches, Implement security controls that protect systems and data from threats, and Automate processes and manage workflows to improve efficiency and security operations.

projects.project_title: Lock Down Zero Bank with Next-Level Security
projects.brief_description: A security review of Zero Bank to identify risks and suggest improvements.
projects.detailed_description: This project tests Zero Bank’s network, website, and database security to find and fix weaknesses. It includes identifying problems, assessing risks, simulating attacks, and providing improvement suggestions. A detailed report will be created and presented to peers, instructors, and professionals. The goal is to strengthen the bank’s systems, protect data, and meet industry standards.
projects.core_features: Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing to identify security weaknesses,Map network and database structures for thorough security evaluation, Perform risk analysis and provide detailed reporting of security threats, and Present findings clearly to stakeholders for informed decision-making.

projects.project_title: Design Smart Data Systems Using Python and MySQL
projects.brief_description: Build and manage sales and customer databases with automation.
projects.detailed_description: Develop and automate StylexCarz’s sales management system using MySQL for database operations and Python for customer record creation, updates, and search functionalities.
projects.core_features: Design structured databases for sales operations, Track and manage customer and order records, Automate updates and data backups, and Build user-friendly menus for record management.

projects.project_title: Design and Automate Scalable Cloud Infrastructure on AWS
projects.brief_description: Build, secure, and automate high-availability AWS services for enterprise workloads.
projects.detailed_description: Migrate Nuize Corporation’s infrastructure to AWS by configuring VPCs, EC2, S3, and Auto Scaling with disaster recovery, automation, and global traffic management for continuous uptime.

projects.project_title: Automate Cloud Infrastructure with Ansible and CloudFormation
projects.brief_description: Streamline deployments, maintenance, and DR using automation on AWS.
projects.detailed_description: Implement automated deployment and maintenance for TechNova’s multi-cloud infrastructure using Ansible and AWS CloudFormation, ensuring scalability, security, and seamless disaster recovery.

projects.project_title: Implement AI-Powered Monitoring and Compliance on AWS
projects.brief_description: Automate AWS monitoring, compliance, and security using GenAI tools.
projects.detailed_description: Develop an AI-driven monitoring solution for Simba Corporation to track AWS resources, automate compliance reporting, detect vulnerabilities, and optimize performance using CloudWatch, EventBridge, and AWS Config.

projects.project_title: Design and Deploy Scalable WordPress Infrastructure on AWS
projects.brief_description: Build a high-availability, cost-optimized WordPress cloud infrastructure.
projects.detailed_description: Migrate Whiteboard’s CRM system to AWS by designing VPCs, deploying scalable WordPress and database instances, configuring load balancing, enabling backups, and integrating CloudWatch monitoring for high availability and performance.
